detectCmp.exists: body > section:not([id]) > div#ensNotifyBanner > div:nth-child(1)#ensBannerDescription > div:nth-child(5):not([id]) > button:nth-child(2)#ensRejectBanner

detectPopup.visible: body > section:not([id]) > div#ensNotifyBanner > div:nth-child(1)#ensBannerDescription > div:nth-child(5):not([id]) > button:nth-child(2)#ensRejectBanner

optOut.waitForThenClick: body > section:not([id]) > div#ensNotifyBanner > div:nth-child(1)#ensBannerDescription > div:nth-child(5):not([id]) > button:nth-child(2)#ensRejectBanner

test.waitForVisible: body > section:not([id]) > div#ensNotifyBanner > div:nth-child(1)#ensBannerDescription > div:nth-child(5):not([id]) > button:nth-child(2)#ensRejectBanner
